Work Experience

Software Developer

The Home Depot

  • Developed internal web applications using Angular and TypeScript to implement new UI features.
  • Used ngrx/store to integrate RESTful APIs on the client side and manage the global state of the application.
  • Added and tested new features and resolved bug fixes to improve application usability.

Content Developer & Themer

Ontario Institute for Cancer Research

  • Created new webpages and email templates using HTML, CSS, Sass, and Bootstrap according to given designs.
  • Added and updated content to existing Jekyll sites HTML, Liquid, YAML Front Matter, and Bootstrap.
  • Tested front-end code in various browsers to ensure cross-browser compatibility and responsiveness.

Front-End Web Developer

Reheart

  • Created custom web pages and sections on Reheart’s website according to given design specifications.
  • Transferred site content to and customized a new theme, which doubled the website’s speed.
  • Integrated and maintained new apps and features (e.g. product reviews, product filters, wishlist).
